header.description: Three scalar values displayed in the report header: the reporting period start date, end date, and the timestamp at which the report was generated. date_from and date_to come from user parameters; generated_at is injected by the engine at runtime.

rows.description: One row per field definition in app_schema_fields. Each row carries the schema identifier, field key name, data type, measurement unit, scale factor, and descriptive text.

totals.description: No totals section required for this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are pass-through display parameters only — they label the reporting period in the header and footer but do not filter rows in app_schema_fields (which has no date column). generated_at is not a stored column; it must be injected by the report engine as the current wall-clock timestamp at generation time.
transformations: No reshape required — app_schema_fields is queried directly with no MELT or UNION_ALL needed.
row_scale should be formatted as a numeric value with up to 4 decimal places for display.
generated_at must be supplied by the report engine at runtime as the current timestamp formatted as DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS.
